Reviews.Title: Remaining battery indicator works on G6!
Reviews.Author: Alex "Bomb-Diggady"
Reviews.Content: I looked and compared all of the third party batteries that would work with my Panasonic G6. I really needed a battery cell that would give me an accurate reminaing battery read. I found this battery to be just what I needed.Why is this a good deal?1.) It works and holds a decent charge2.) It is significantly cheaper than the stock Panny battery for the G63.) This is the big one for me: my G6 gives an accurate remaining battery reading with this battery, so I don't have to worry about my camera just shutting off without warning. From what I've read, other brands of the same battery model do not have this capability.I've only had this battery for about a month, but it has lasted and been consistent thus far. Purchasing this battery should be a no-brainer for owners of a G6.

Reviews.Title: Battery Replacement
Reviews.Author: Alvin L. Williamson "Leroy Williamson"
Reviews.Content: No problems with this battery in the Lumix FZ200.  Fast delivery.  Have had problems with third party batteries in the past, but not with this one.

Reviews.Title: Good inexpensive battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mike Henley"
Reviews.Content: This battery seems to work just fine in my Lumix FZ200. I wanted a backup battery for when I'm away from the house. The price was right, and supposedly has more reserve power than the name brand battery. Absolutely no complaints, so far.

Reviews.Title: A Superb Battery for the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ200
Reviews.Author: Randy Wakeman "Randy Wakeman"
Reviews.Content: Better capacity than the OEM battery, works perfectly with the Panasonic charger and the FZ-200. There is nothing not to like. Instead of paying over $40 for a Chinese battery with Panasonic stamped on it, $14 for this battery (with a better warranty) makes perfect sense. I bought two, as I do substantial video.These batteries are great bargains compared to the OEM rip-off priced little gems.

Reviews.Title: Good Battery
Reviews.Author: Deborah Mintz
Reviews.Content: Battery is great holds charge better than the one that came with camera, came very quickly, was leaving on a trip and needed it quickly.

Reviews.Title: Good to have extra's
Reviews.Author: B. J. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I have not tried this yet in my Lumix DMC-G5  so I hope it works.  It looks like the others so I have high expectations for it.

Reviews.Title: WORKS GREAT AT A GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: B.E.
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a backup battery for my new Lumix camera.  The battery is identical to the original in shape, and connects just fine, including showing (via the camera screen) how much charge remains. I think the 1600 mAH is a bit more than the original battery, but I don't know if that was of benefit.  All I know is, the battery functioned VERY well in my camera over an 8-day tour workout, at least as well as the camera's original Panasonic version. And the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Just What I Needed
Reviews.Author: Farron G.
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly with the Panasonic DMC G5, a much needed addition to my toolkit. Holds it charge just as well as the factory equivalent.

Reviews.Title: So far so Good
Reviews.Author: Wayne Simpson
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about buying an aftermarket battery, but so far it has provided about the same battery life as the battery that came with my Panasonic Lumix G6

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Alex Smythers
Reviews.Content: This seems to work fine, and you will want to have a backup battery for work in the field.

Reviews.Title: Nice to have backup
Reviews.Author: E. P. Montfort "BigEM"
Reviews.Content: It's nice to have a charged battery in the camera bag, so that, as the battery in the camera starts to run down, I can just switch the batteries.  Since this isn't a battery that you can find just anywhere, it's great not to have to worry about it.

Reviews.Title: Sure, your car came with a "mini" spare, but you wouldn't drive on it except in an emergency. Would you? Same here!
Reviews.Author: Derek Simmons
Reviews.Content: I bought this battery for the price. I guess I got what I paid for. What I didn't get--and what some previous reviewers suggested I would get--is a battery that tells you how much "juice" you have left. (Think "mini" spare analogy: you know up front NOT to drive on it except to the closest service station.) Use this Halcyon battery the same way. Keep it as a spare, charged up and ready to go when your "real" LUMIX battery goes "flat" when you're out on the road. Then use the Halcyon but then REMEMBER: charge the "real" LUMIX and swap it back into the camera at the earliest opportunity just as you would with your cars "mini" spare tire.DO NOT TRUST THE ICON in your viewfinder when the camera is on "Halcyon" power. It lies! It doesn't lie when the LUMIX battery is doing the work. I'd buy it again as a "spare", but I would never plan on "hitting the road" on Halcyon power. You WILL miss the shot of a lifetime. Including the "selfie" of you kicking and screaming.

Reviews.Title: Overall a great deal.
Reviews.Author: Leepnow
Reviews.Content: Charges at the same rate as the Panasonic, has greater amp hours, and shows levels in camera. Maybe it's just me, but it doesn't seem to  hold a "non use" charge for my requirements, which is holding a "full" charge for two - three weeks after charging.  While I alternate batteries in my camera, if I don't use it immediately after charging, I don't get as many shots as my Panasonic battery.  I still haven't determined if the level readings are accurate yet, and given that some batteries have been reported to wipe your memory card when they are  "empty" and in need of recharging, I'm going to watch this carefully.  I just wish there was some sort of case for the battery as the terminals are exposed and should be protected, particularly as I often carry spare batteries in my pocket.If all checks out to be good, I will be buying a couple more of these.

Reviews.Title: Good, inexpensive replacement battery
Reviews.Author: Malcolm Schoen
Reviews.Content: I had been worried because in past had had problems with non-Nikon replacement batteries for my previous camera.  But this battery seems to have long life, charges as quickly as the original, and is a good spare for me to have.

Reviews.Title: Spare battery
Reviews.Author: Diane Ploussard
Reviews.Content: This spare battery charges fast and holds the charge as long as the original. It was a good buy and I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: It's a battery and it works!!
Reviews.Author: Scottie Parks
Reviews.Content: I received the battery. It had zero charge when received. I charged it up and put it in my Lumix FZ200 and it works!! I have not used a complete charge cycle yet, but it seems to register on the battery meter in the camera just fine.

Reviews.Title: So, so battery performance
Reviews.Author: Information Security Instructor
Reviews.Content: While the battery is rated at 1600mAH, I am getting significantly fewer shots (maybe 100) than the original battery (around 200 shots) that came with the Panasonic / Lumix camera.  You get what you pay for.  It is nice to have a backup, but I do not use this as my primary battery.

Reviews.Title: Good Back-Up
Reviews.Author: Wade Allred
Reviews.Content: Great price for a spare battery.  Does not reflect accurate charge reading.  Mine dies while reading is still over 50%.  It provides nearly 75% of factory original.  It works okay for the price.

Reviews.Title: Better than many others on the market
Reviews.Author: Douglas Guerette
Reviews.Content: The price is good, it charges fairly quickly, and it interfaces with the camera "battery level" display while most others don't. It would be perfect if it came with a storage case since the FAA requires Lithium batteries be encased in such a way as they cannot be short-circuited accidentally. Since this is a "spare" it is in storage 50% of the time.

Reviews.Title: Terrible, you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: John Easterday
Reviews.Content: I bought this because the original batteries seem outrageously expensive. Unfortunately, this is cheap but after using it 4 days or so it would completely lose charge after just a couple of hours. The original battery lasts 2 days taking lots of shots. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Great price, more powerful than original battery and charges up nicely.
Reviews.Author: Bob Y. from Redding
Reviews.Content: Delivered quickly as promised.  Great price.  More powerful than the original battery.  Charged up nicely.  Works in the camera.  Haven't tried to see how long it lasts in the camera yet. I am happy with it.  5 stars if it holds up well over time.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as OEM battery
Reviews.Author: Brent Trafton
Reviews.Content: The Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Panasonic Lumix FZ200 works okay but it is not as good as the OEM battery.  I can get over 600 shots from the OEM battery but only around 230 from the Halcyon.  The OEM cost 3 times more than the Halcyon, so it is a fair trade off.The Halcyon is a decent value as long as you know what you are getting.  If I had known about the difference in performance, I would have probably spent the extra money and purchased the OEM Panasonic battery.

Reviews.Title: Battery is dead.
Reviews.Author: maureen o'doogan
Reviews.Content: I plugged it into the charger for several hours, and it didn't power up the camera.  Next I plugged it in overnight, and still nothing.  It's not a matter of the battery not lasting as long; this battery didn't hold a charge at all.  I've bought non-OEM batteries before with no problem, but sadly not this time.Beware that Amazon doesn't fulfill this order, so convenient replacements aren't available.Edit:  Within an hour of submitting seller feedback, I got an e-mail saying that they were sending me a replacement.  Fingers crossed this one will work better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLC12 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Panasonic Lumix FZ200 Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLC12
